summary_comment: The professor offers an easy class with minimal homework (only two papers and two presentations), though some find the workload excessive for a three-credit-hour course. Students appreciate the interesting guest speakers and the teacher's interest in the subject matter, though feedback varies regarding the teacher's responsiveness and the group work requirement. Overall, opinions are mixed, with some strongly recommending it as a writing class and others finding it overly demanding.

Ratings.comment: Very easy class. Only had to write 2 papers and do 2 presentations. Not much work at all. Class was over 2 hours long but she always let us go an hour early. Definitely recommended for a second writing class!!
Speakers were very interesting. Teacher not helpful, takes forever to email back and lost my final paper and told me about it a day before grades were due. So frustrating!!
Good speakers, way too much work for a 3 cr hr class, grade is based on group work forcing you to entrust others too much
Great speakers brought in, helpful assignments, requires effort but not set up to overwhelm, very interested in what she teaches, learned a TON
